TravelCreditDetails.NameWaiverMatchMessage: Flexible credits during COVID-19. Normally, future flight credits must be used by the same traveler the credit was issued to. However, because this credit was issued for a ticket purchased on or before 8/31/2021, it can be used by anyone.

MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.ContentFull: This credit is for a trip originally booked by a travel agency. Please contact the agency directly to use this credit.
MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.Title: RTI.TravelCertificate.LookUpTravelCredits.ErrorMessage4

MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.ContentFull: This future flight credit can't be used on our website or app. Please contact Customer Support to book a flight using this credit.

MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.Title: RTI.TravelCertificate.LookUpTravelCredits.ErrorMessage5

MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.ContentFull: This future flight credit can't be used for the selected travel dates. To use this credit, your travel must begin by {0}.
MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.Title: RTI.TravelCertificate.LookUpTravelCredits.ErrorMessage3

MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.ContentFull: This credit can only be used by the traveler it was issued to, so the names on the credit and booking must match.

MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.Title: RTI.TravelCertificate.LookUpTravelCredits.ErrorMessage2

MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.ContentFull: Travel booked with future flight credits must begin before the “Travel by” date.

MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.ContentFull: We can’t find this future flight credit. We couldn’t find any future flight credits that match the confirmation number and name you entered. MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.ContentFull: What are travel credits?
MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.HeadLine: Travel Credit
MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.Title: RTI.TravelCertificate.ReviewTravelCredits.WhatTravelCredit

MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.ContentFull:
Future flight credits and travel certificates can be used to book travel on United, United Express® and partner-operated flights. Learn more

Travel booked with future flight credits must begin before the “Travel by” date, while travel certificates must be used to purchase a ticket by the “Book by” date.

MOBMobileCMSContentMessages.ContentFull: You'll have a remaining balance of ${0}. This will be combined into a new travel certificate that you'll receive via email once you complete your purchase. The latest expiration date will become your new travel certificate's expiration date
